title: [Large-scale] Virtual Literacy Chunk Learning Project for Generation Z

context.prior_knowledge: Basic information retrieval skills and fundamental understanding of digital environments
context.additional_context: Project-based education focusing on strengthening virtual environment literacy competencies for science research and job performance

learning_goals: Learners can explain methods for evaluating the credibility of scientific information using under-3-minute video content
Learners can apply academic database search strategies to real-world projects through chunked learning in TikTok format
Learners can propose ethical utilization plans for information collected in virtual environments through PBL team activities
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
